title: Suspect in Brooklyn U-Haul incident was having 'a mental health crisis': Police
description: A U-Haul driver was “suffering from a mental health crisis” and was off his medication when he allegedly hit nine people in Brooklyn on Monday, police said.

title: Mass shooter Payton Gendron set to be sentenced
description: The teenager who murdered 10 people in a racially motivated mass shooting in Buffalo is set to be sentenced on Wednesday to life in prison,

title: Court to reconsider Connecticut's transgender athlete policy
description: Connecticut allows transgender girls to compete in girls high school sports.

title: FBI announces investigation into Harris County Jail amid inmate deaths
description: The FBI has announced investigations into the Harris County Jail amid the deaths of inmates.

title: Hose becomes prime evidence in Alex Murdaugh's murder trial
description: The man who took care of Alex Murdaugh’s dogs testified Tuesday during the disgraced attorney’s double murder trial that puddles of water were not where they should have been when police responded to the killings of Murdaugh's son and wife

title: Author Rachel Hollis says family 'devastated' by death of ex-husband at 47
description: Rachel Hollis's ex-husband Dave Hollis died unexpectedly at age 47.

title: Judge vacates conviction of man imprisoned nearly 3 decades
description: He was serving a life prison sentence for a killing he says he didn’t commit.

title: Lawyer: Pamela Smart, serving life sentence, asks for hope
description: Pamela Smart is serving life without parole for plotting with her teenage lover.

title: Feinstein announces retirement at end of term, setting up contentious Senate primary
description: Sen. Dianne Feinstein, D-Calif., announced Tuesday that she will not run for reelection after her term is up in early 2025 but will continue serving until then.

title: Court upholds fine imposed on Trump over his failure to comply with subpoena
description: A court upheld a $110,000 fine imposed on former President Donald Trump over his failure to comply with a subpoena issued by the New York Attorney General's office.

title: Winner of $2B Powerball jackpot to be revealed in California
description: The winner of November's record-high Powerball jackpot will soon be revealed.

title: Yellen warns of 'catastrophe' if debt limit not raised
description: Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen is warning that the U.S. faces “economic catastrophe” if Congress and the White House don’t take action to raise the federal debt limit

title: Jan. 6 rioter who used stun gun on police officer pleads guilty
description: A Jan. 6 rioter who used a stun gun on a police officer plead guilty on Tuesday.

title: German ballet director issues apology over feces attack
description: A German ballet director has issued a public apology for smearing dog feces on the face of a newspaper critic whose reviews he had taken exception to

title: Bus in northern South Africa crashes with van; 20 dead
description: A crash between a passenger bus and a van armored to carry cash in the northern province of Limpopo, South Africa has killed at least 20 people and injured 68, officials have reported

title: Fake sports memorabilia worth millions seized
description: The South Carolina Secretary of State says law enforcement agents confiscated over 600 fake championship rings across four major U.S. professional sports leagues and the NCAA from a South Carolina memorabilia store as part of a seizure of counterfeit m...

title: Philanthropy 50: List of America’s top 50 donors of 2022
description: As the ranks of America’s super wealthy grow, the roster of major philanthropists is expanding to include not-so-typical megadonors — among them, a professional clarinetist, a Ph.D. in meat science, and a lawyer who regularly argues before the U.S. Sup...

title: Polish mother of 7 successfully gives birth to quintuplets
description: Hospital officials in southern Poland say a Polish mother of seven has successfully given birth to premature quintuplets

title: Air India reveals orders for 470 Boeing, Airbus jets
description: Air India has unveiled orders for 470 Boeing and Airbus aircraft

title: DOJ giving states $231M for gun violence prevention programs
description: The Justice Department is sending out more than $200 million to help states and the District of Columbia administer “red-flag laws” and other crisis-intervention programs

title: Pence expected to fight special counsel subpoena in Trump probe
description: Former Vice President Mike Pence is expected to fight special counsel Jack Smith's grand jury subpoena, sources familiar with the matter told ABC News.

title: Taiwan threatens to shoot down any Chinese balloons
description: Taiwan's Defense Ministry says it will shoot down any suspected Chinese military object coming close to its shores but has yet to find balloons of the kind that have been brought down over and around American air space

title: China's Xi expresses support for Iran amid Western pressure
description: Chinese leader Xi Jinping has expressed support for Iran during a visit by its president as Tehran tries to expand relations with Beijing and Moscow to offset Western sanctions over its nuclear development

title: Toyota founder's son, who led global growth, dies at 97
description: Shoichiro Toyoda, who as a son of the company’s founder oversaw Toyota’s expansion into international markets, has died

title: MSU students recount mass shooting: 'I was ducking and covering'
description: Students recount their horrifying experiences as a deadly mass shooting unfolded at Michigan State University on Monday night.

title: Parkland school shooting 5 years later: Remembering the 17 victims
description: Seventeen students and staff were killed in the February 2018 Stoneman Douglas massacre.

title: Nikki Haley launches presidential campaign
description: Former U.N. Ambassador Haley announced her presidential bid on Tuesday.

title: MSU mass shooting live updates: 3 killed, 5 injured in 'horrific act of violence'
description: Live updates on the mass shooting that took place at Michigan State University on the night of Feb. 13, 2023.

title: Inflation data to show if prices eased amid hot jobs market
description: Economists predict that inflation cooled for the seventh straight month.

title: US renews warning it'll defend Philippines after China spat
description: The United States has renewed a warning that it will defend its treaty ally if Filipino forces come under attack in the disputed South China Sea

title: WATCH:  Animals rescued in Turkey following earthquake
description: Volunteers with Turkey's Animal Rights Federation break down the door of a home to rescue a dog trapped inside.

title: Suspect at large after 'shots fired' at Michigan State University campus, police say
description: There have been "shots fired" near Berkey Hall on Michigan State University's East Lansing campus, police said Monday night.

title: Indonesia promises move to clean energy, but challenges loom
description: Indonesia, one of the world's largest coal-producing countries, has agreed to drastically reduce its reliance on fossil fuels in the coming decades

title: Officer fired in Tyre Nichols case had minor reprimands
description: Records obtained by The Associated Press show a Memphis police officer who hit Tyre Nichols with a stun gun during a traffic stop that preceded Nichols’ brutal beating by other officers had a prior record of minor reprimands

title: American likely killed by guided missile in 'deliberate' Russian attack
description: Medic volunteer Pete Reed and a Ukrainian woman he was treating in Bakhmut died.

title: 3 fishermen dead after falling through icy lake in Vermont: Police
description: Authorities in Vermont are warning ice fishers to stay off the ice of a lake after three people died in the last week.
